content: La nipote del pittore tedesco Otto Dix ha accusato la Germania di non avere realmente affrontato la questione delle opere d'arte sequestrate dai nazisti.
translations: eng:The granddaughter of German painter Otto Dix accused Germany of never really having addressed the issue of works of art
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
